00038 void GameLevel::drawLevel()
00039 {
00040 
00041     ngl::Transformation trans;
00042 
00043     unsigned int bodies=_physicsEngine->getNumCollisionObjects();
00044 
00045     ngl::Mat4 MVP;
00046     ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00047     (*shader)["Texture"]->use();
00048 
00049     for(int i=0; (i<bodies) && (i<= _numberOfObstacles); ++i)
00050     {
00051 
00052         trans.setMatrix(_physicsEngine->getTransformMatrix(i));
00053         m_transformStack.setCurrent(trans);
00054         if ((i==0) && (m_freeCamFlag == 0))
00055         {
00056            ngl::Vec3 grenadeCurrentPos = _physicsEngine->getPosition(i);
00057 
00058            if((_drawEngine->getActiveCam() == _drawEngine->getSpecificCam(CAM_DEFAULT)))
00059             {
00060                 _drawEngine->getActiveCam()->setEye(ngl::Vec4((grenadeCurrentPos.m_x),30,(grenadeCurrentPos.m_z - 40)));
00061             }
00062             else if((_drawEngine->getActiveCam() == _drawEngine->getSpecificCam(CAM_TOP)))
00063             {
00064                  _drawEngine->getActiveCam()->setEye(ngl::Vec4(grenadeCurrentPos.m_x,200,grenadeCurrentPos.m_z,1));
00065             }
00066             else if((_drawEngine->getActiveCam() == _drawEngine->getSpecificCam(CAM_LEFT)))
00067             {
00068                 _drawEngine->getActiveCam()->setEye(ngl::Vec4((grenadeCurrentPos.m_x + 80),30,grenadeCurrentPos.m_z,1));
00069 
00070             }
00071             else if((_drawEngine->getActiveCam() == _drawEngine->getSpecificCam(CAM_RIGHT)))
00072             {
00073                 _drawEngine->getActiveCam()->setEye(ngl::Vec4((grenadeCurrentPos.m_x - 80),30,grenadeCurrentPos.m_z,1));
00074 
00075             }
00076      }
00077 
00078 
00079 
00080 
00081      MVP= m_transformStack.getCurrentTransform().getMatrix() * _drawEngine->getActiveCam()->getVPMatrix(); //m_modelRepos[_modelIndex]->getCam()->getVPMatrix() ;
00082      shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("qt_ModelViewProjectionMatrix",MVP);
00083 
00084      switch(_physicsEngine->getCollisionShape(i))
00085      {
00086        case BOX_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE :
00087         {
00088             if ((m_modelRepos[i]->getModelName() == MODEL_CRATEBOX) && (_physicsEngine->getGameWonFlag() == false))
00089             {
00090                 _drawEngine->drawModels(m_modelRepos[i]);
00091             }
00092             break;
00093         }
00094        case CONVEX_HULL_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE:
00095         {
00096             _drawEngine->drawModels(m_modelRepos[i]);
00097             break;
00098         }
00099 
00100         case STATIC_PLANE_PROXYTYPE:
00101         {
00102             ngl::TransformStack tempTransformation = m_modelRepos[i]->getTransformStack();
00103 
00104             tempTransformation.pushTransform();
00105             {
00106                 tempTransformation.getCurrentTransform().setPosition(m_modelRepos[i]->getPosition());
00107                 tempTransformation.getCurrentTransform().setRotation(m_modelRepos[i]->getRotation());
00108                 tempTransformation.getCurrentTransform().setScale(m_modelRepos[i]->getScale());
00109                 MVP= tempTransformation.getCurrentTransform().getMatrix() * _drawEngine->getActiveCam()->getVPMatrix(); //m_modelRepos[_modelIndex]->getCam()->getVPMatrix() ;
00110                 shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("qt_ModelViewProjectionMatrix",MVP);
00111                 _drawEngine->drawModels(m_modelRepos[i]);
00112             }
00113             tempTransformation.popTransform();
00114             break;
00115         }
00116 
00117       }
00118     }
00119 
00120 
00121     drawExtras();
00122 
00123 }

00137 void GameLevel::addObstaclesToLevel()
00138 {
00139     ngl::Random *randObj = ngl::Random::instance();
00140 
00141     if (m_difficulty == BEGINNER)
00142     {
00143         _numberOfObstacles = randObj->randomPositiveNumber(20);
00144     }
00145     else
00146     {
00147         _numberOfObstacles = randObj->randomPositiveNumber(25);
00148     }
00149 
00150 
00151    for(int i=1;i<=_numberOfObstacles;i++) // 0th pos is reserved for PLAYER,so obstacle shud not be inserted
00152                                           //hence loop from i=1
00153    {
00154         std::cout<<"coming in addobstacles";
00155         if ( i != 1)
00156         {
00157             m_modelRepos[i] = m_modelRepos[i - 1]->cloneItself();
00158         }
00159         else
00160         {
00161             m_modelRepos[i] = GameModelFactory::makeGameModel(MODEL_OBSTACLE);
00162             m_modelRepos[i]->setDrawArea(_drawEngine);
00163         }
00164     }
00165 
00166     _numberOfObstacles++;
00167 
00168 }

00170 void GameLevel::addCrateBoxToLevel()
00171 {
00172 
00173     m_modelRepos[_numberOfObstacles] = GameModelFactory::makeGameModel(MODEL_CRATEBOX);
00174     m_modelRepos[_numberOfObstacles]->setDrawArea(_drawEngine);
00175     m_modelRepos[_numberOfObstacles]->setPosition(ngl::Vec3(-80,0,m_modelRepos[_numberOfObstacles - 1]->getPosition().m_z + 380));
00176      _numberOfObstacles++;
00177 }

00180 void GameLevel::addBGToLevel()
00181 {
00182     m_modelRepos[_numberOfObstacles] = new GameModel(_drawEngine,ngl::Vec3(0,0,0),ngl::Vec4(0,0,0,1),ngl::Vec4(100,0,300,1),"models/ground_plane.obj","textures/grass.jpg",MODEL_BGS);
00183     _numberOfObstacles++;
00184     m_modelRepos[_numberOfObstacles] = new GameModel(_drawEngine,ngl::Vec3(0,-50,0),ngl::Vec4(0,0,0,1),ngl::Vec4(50,50,50,1),"models/ammunition.obj","textures/SkyBox_Clouds.png",MODEL_SKY);

00203 void GameLevel::simulateAI()
00204 {
00205 
00206 
00207     static int x = 0; // temp variable to delay change in direction of tank movements in level3
00208     static float velocity = 0.1;
00209     if (  x > 100)
00210     {
00211         x = 0;
00212         velocity = (-velocity);
00213     }
00214 
00215 
00216     for(int i=0;i<=_numberOfObstacles;i++)
00217 
00218     {
00219          if((i+1) <= _numberOfObstacles)
00220          {
00221             switch(m_modelRepos[i + 1]->getModelName())
00222             {
00223                 case MODEL_OBSTACLE:
00224                 {
00225                      _physicsEngine->moveBox((i + 1),velocity); // according to bullet, our obstacles start from 2, so i + 1
00226                       break;
00227                 }
00228                 default:
00229                     break;
00230             }
00231         }
00232     }
00233 
00234     x++;
00235 }

00237 
00238 void GameLevel::addCollisionBoxes()
00239 {
00240 
00241     ngl::Vec3 pos = 0;
00242     ngl::Vec3 rot = 0;
00243     ngl::Vec4 scale = 0;
00244 
00245 
00246     for(int i=0;i<m_modelRepos.size();i++)
00247     {
00248          pos = m_modelRepos[i]->getPosition();
00249          scale = m_modelRepos[i]->getScale();
00250          rot = m_modelRepos[i]->getRotation();
00251          std::cout<<"scale is :"<<scale;
00252          switch(m_modelRepos[i]->getModelName())
00253          {
00254             case MODEL_PLAYER:
00255             {
00256                 _physicsEngine->addConvexGrenade(pos);
00257                 break;
00258             }
00259             case MODEL_OBSTACLE:
00260             {
00261                 _physicsEngine->addConvexStones(pos,rot);
00262                 break;
00263             }
00264             case MODEL_CRATEBOX:
00265             {
00266                 _physicsEngine->addBox(pos,(scale * 10),CRATE_AMMUNITION);  // this 10 has to be given appropriate value if ammunition box is scaled
00267                 break;
00268             }
00269 
00270             case MODEL_BGS:
00271             {
00272                 _physicsEngine->addGround(pos);
00273                 break;
00274             }
00275          }
00276      }
00277 
00278         // add all 3 walls - left, right and far beyond the last goal - crate box
00279         _physicsEngine->addBox(ngl::Vec3(250,0,-100),ngl::Vec4(10,1000,1000,1),INVISIBLE_WALL); // change the 1000 and 2 to constant values
00280         _physicsEngine->addBox(ngl::Vec3(-250,0,-100),ngl::Vec4(10,1000,1000,1),INVISIBLE_WALL);
00281         _physicsEngine->addBox(ngl::Vec3(0,0,m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_BACK]->getPosition().m_z),ngl::Vec4(1000,1000,10,1),INVISIBLE_WALL);
00282 }

00285 void GameLevel::moveGrenade()
00286 {
00287     // if its level3 call this func with 3 args..so third arg as to be got via a random number generator
00288 
00289     _physicsEngine->moveGrenade((accumulatedDirection),accumulatedAcceleration);
00290 }

00292 void GameLevel::moveGrenade(int _windValue)
00293 {
00294     // if its level3 call this func with 3 args..so third arg as to be got via a random number generator
00295 
00296     _physicsEngine->moveGrenade((accumulatedDirection),accumulatedAcceleration,_windValue);

00306 void GameLevel::accumulateDirection(int _inputdir)
00307 {
00308     ngl::Transformation trans;
00309     trans.setMatrix(_physicsEngine->getTransformMatrix(0));
00310 
00311     if(_inputdir != 0)
00312     {
00313         accumulatedDirection = accumulatedDirection + _inputdir;
00314 
00315 
00316         if(accumulatedDirection > 90)
00317         {
00318             accumulatedDirection = 90;
00319         }
00320         else if (accumulatedDirection < -90)
00321         {
00322             accumulatedDirection = -90;
00323         }
00324 
00325     m_graphicRepos[DIRECTION_ARROW]->setRotation(ngl::Vec4(0,accumulatedDirection,0,1));
00326 
00327     }
00328     else if (_inputdir == 0)
00329     {
00330 
00331         m_graphicRepos[DIRECTION_ARROW]->setRotation(ngl::Vec4(0,0,0,1));
00332 
00333     }
00334 }

00336 
00337 void GameLevel::accumulateAcceleration(int _inputAcceleration)
00338 {
00339 
00340 
00341     if(_inputAcceleration != 0)
00342     {
00343         accumulatedAcceleration = accumulatedAcceleration + _inputAcceleration;
00344 
00345 
00346         if(accumulatedAcceleration >= 40)
00347         {
00348             accumulatedAcceleration = 40;
00349         }
00350 
00351         else if (accumulatedAcceleration <= 0)
00352         {
00353             accumulatedAcceleration = 0;
00354         }
00355 
00356     }
00357 
00358     else if (_inputAcceleration == 0) // for down arrow to reduce power
00359     {
00360         accumulatedAcceleration = 0;
00361     }
00362 
00363 }

00366 void GameLevel::addGraphicImages()
00367 {
00368     m_graphicRepos[DIRECTION_ARROW] = new GameModel(_drawEngine,ngl::Vec3(0,0,0),/*_physicsEngine->getPosition(MODEL_PLAYER),*/ngl::Vec4(0,0,0,1),ngl::Vec4(3,1,3,1),"models/arrow.obj","textures/Stone.png",MODEL_GRAPHICS);
00369 
00370     m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_LEFT] = new GameModel(_drawEngine,ngl::Vec3(250,0,-100),ngl::Vec4(0,90,0,1),ngl::Vec4(10,10,10,1),"models/sandbags_02.obj","textures/sandbags.jpg",MODEL_GRAPHICS);
00371 
00372     m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_RIGHT] = new GameModel(_drawEngine,ngl::Vec3(-250,0,-100),ngl::Vec4(0,-90,0,1),ngl::Vec4(10,10,10,1),"models/sandbags_02.obj","textures/sandbags.jpg",MODEL_GRAPHICS);
00373 
00374 
00375     // the back wall of the world is always placed beyond the last obstacle..so this is not hardcoded..each time the final crate box' position changes, our world's back wall will change accordingly
00376     m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_BACK] = new GameModel(_drawEngine,ngl::Vec3(0,0,m_modelRepos[_numberOfObstacles - 2]->getPosition().m_z + 3),ngl::Vec4(0,0,0,1),ngl::Vec4(10,10,10,1),"models/sandbags_02.obj","textures/sandbags.jpg",MODEL_GRAPHICS);
00377 
00378 }

00381 // draws other extra meshes such as skybox, boundary walls(predifned locations) and graphical direction arrows(at the position of the player)
00382 void GameLevel::drawExtras()
00383 {
00384 
00385      ngl::TransformStack tempTransformStack;
00386 
00387     for(int i=0;i<m_graphicRepos.size();i++)
00388     {
00389 
00390         switch (i)
00391         {
00392         case DIRECTION_ARROW:
00393 
00394             if((arrowDraw == 1) && (_physicsEngine->getSimulationFlag() == 0)) // just to make sure the grenade is not in air while direction arrow is drawn
00395             {
00396             tempTransformStack = m_graphicRepos[DIRECTION_ARROW]->getTransformStack();
00397             loadModelsWithoutBulletTransformations(tempTransformStack,_physicsEngine->getPosition(0),m_graphicRepos[DIRECTION_ARROW]->getRotation(),m_graphicRepos[DIRECTION_ARROW]->getScale());
00398 
00399             _drawEngine->drawModels(m_graphicRepos[DIRECTION_ARROW]);
00400             }
00401             break;
00402 
00403         case BOUNDARY_WALL_LEFT:
00404             tempTransformStack = m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_LEFT]->getTransformStack();
00405 
00406             for (float i = -250; i <= 250;i=i+55)
00407             {
00408                 loadModelsWithoutBulletTransformations(tempTransformStack,ngl::Vec3(m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_LEFT]->getPosition().m_x,0,i),m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_LEFT]->getRotation(),m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_LEFT]->getScale());
00409 
00410                 _drawEngine->drawModels(m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_LEFT]);
00411             }
00412 
00413             break;
00414         case BOUNDARY_WALL_RIGHT:
00415             tempTransformStack = m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_RIGHT]->getTransformStack();
00416             for (float i = -250; i <= 250;i=i+55)
00417             {
00418                 loadModelsWithoutBulletTransformations(tempTransformStack,ngl::Vec3(m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_RIGHT]->getPosition().m_x,0,i),m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_RIGHT]->getRotation(),m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_RIGHT]->getScale());
00419 
00420                 _drawEngine->drawModels(m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_RIGHT]);
00421             }
00422             break;
00423         case BOUNDARY_WALL_BACK:
00424             tempTransformStack = m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_BACK]->getTransformStack();
00425 
00426             for (float i = -250; i <= 250;i=i+55)
00427             {
00428                 loadModelsWithoutBulletTransformations(tempTransformStack,ngl::Vec3(i,0,m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_BACK]->getPosition().m_z),m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_BACK]->getRotation(),m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_BACK]->getScale());
00429                  _drawEngine->drawModels(m_graphicRepos[BOUNDARY_WALL_BACK]);
00430             }
00431 
00432 
00433 
00434             break;
00435 
00436         default:
00437             break;
00438         }
00439 
00440 
00441     }
00442 
00443 
00444     // drawing SKY BOX which is our last obstacle in the model repository
00445     loadModelsWithoutBulletTransformations(m_modelRepos[_numberOfObstacles]->getTransformStack(),m_modelRepos[_numberOfObstacles]->getPosition(),m_modelRepos[_numberOfObstacles]->getRotation(),m_modelRepos[_numberOfObstacles]->getScale());
00446     _drawEngine->drawModels(m_modelRepos[_numberOfObstacles]);
00447 
00448 
00449 
00450 }

00453 void GameLevel::loadModelsWithoutBulletTransformations(ngl::TransformStack _transformStack, const ngl::Vec3& _pos,const ngl::Vec4& _rot, const ngl::Vec4& _scale)
00454 {
00455 
00456     ngl::Mat4 MVP;
00457 
00458     ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00459 
00460 
00461     {
00462     _transformStack.getCurrentTransform().setPosition(_pos);
00463     _transformStack.getCurrentTransform().setRotation(_rot);
00464     _transformStack.getCurrentTransform().setScale(_scale);
00465     MVP= _transformStack.getCurrentTransform().getMatrix() * _drawEngine->getActiveCam()->getVPMatrix(); //m_modelRepos[_modelIndex]->getCam()->getVPMatrix() ;
00466     shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("qt_ModelViewProjectionMatrix",MVP);
00467     }
00468 
00469 }
